commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Everyone ready? One, two, three!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Good work!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you guys so much!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I'm glad the Î¼'s interviews went off without a hitch!)

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You still have to write the article, don't you? It's not quite time for you to relax yet, is it? *Giggle*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Exactly! I'll send you all a copy when it's done!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What the heck are you doing, being all buddy-buddy?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What's wrong with you, Nico?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: She's a school idol from Nijigasaki! They're our rivals!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm actually just a supporter, so I'm not a school idol. I'm sorry I didn't tell you, Nico!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: We should have told you Nico. Sorry.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We all love school idols though, so that makes us the same. I'm glad to do an interview with someone like that!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Anyway, did you see something special in our lives while following us around?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There was...a lot of stuff I didn't get.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wait, really? Can you write the article?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I fell in love with school idols after happening upon your collab performance with Aqours.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That show was so brilliant and exciting that it nearly brought tears to my eyes.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Really? So you saw that show!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: On that stage, you all had so much energy. I did these interviews hoping I could get a feel for why you're so charming.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: But you couldn't figure it out?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Of course you didn't! Our performances aren't so shallow that you can just duplicate them after one glance!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We don't really know how other groups work on their performances, so we have no idea what we do differently.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: That's right. I wish we could explain it better.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think just realizing that there's so much I still don't get was really important.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: So knowing that you don't know is...good?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Honoka said that we're the same because we all love school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But even still, we don't have nearly the same amount of experience on stage or in practice.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, I think it's only natural I wasn't able to find the source of Î¼'s' charm so easily.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hmm... Are you sure that's enough? Umi, do you have anything?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Don't put me on the spot like that.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle*...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Nozomi? What's up with you?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Actually... I think Nico-chi holds the key to Î¼'s' charm.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Really?! I always knew you were special, Nico!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: O-Of course I do! The whole reason Î¼'s got so big is because I'm here!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: But you were just surprised about it yourself.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I hope Nozomi isn't up to something again.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* Do you want to know what makes us charming?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-Yes!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You can find the key to our charm written in that Secret Idol Handbook over there!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wait, since when did we have something so mysterious?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Do you mean the thing Nico made?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh... I see now! The secret to how big we've become is in the notes I made!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Is that true?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (So the secret is hidden in the notebook Nico made: The Secret Idol Handbook!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nico, please show me the Secret Idol Handbook!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nope! This is my treasure!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: B-But, I have to see it! It's the key to Î¼'s' charm!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Looking at me with shimmering eyes like that WON'T work!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, okay. I guess I shouldn't expect you to show me something so important.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Okay, we'll have a contest for it.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: A contest?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Î¼'s has nine members, and so does Nijigasaki's school idol club. Perfect, right?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Wait, a contest between Otonokizaka and Nijigasaki High?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nine contests between Î¼'s and Nijigasaki! If you win, I'll show you the key to our charm!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Seriously?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (A contest between Î¼'s and Nijigasaki?! This is getting out of hand!)
